1.title: Racially Targeted Arrests in the Era of Marijuana Reform
1.subtitle: For decades, marijuana laws have been used to criminalize Black and Brown people, waste taxpayer money, and fuel the mass incarceration crisis. However, states across the country are taking strides toward reforming these outdated and harmful policies.

products.name: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot
products.description: This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

products.name: SHE CAN 4-Pack Sampler

2.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
2.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

2.title: Beauty Bakerie

products.name: Eyelash Icing Waterproof Mascara

products.name: Blending Egg Beauty Sponges
products.description: Cooked up with you in mind, Blending Egg Beauty Sponges were uniquely created to fit in the palm of your hand for seamless blending. Try a recipe with a dash or two of Cake Face Concealer and bake until your heart's content with Flour Setting Powder. Blending Eggs will be your new favorite tool for eggs-traordinary cakin' that's hard to beat! Hehe.

3.subtitle: Energy bars formulated for women perimenopause to post to help support daily nutritional needs and keep that sneaky extra 10 pounds under control!

This book encourages children to accept their unique qualities, and promotes positive self-esteem and a healthy lifestyle.

4.title: Doe Wiz Apparel

5.title: Tell Congress to Support the MORE Act (H.R. 3884/S. 2227)
5.subtitle: We believe in cannabis legalization, but only if it’s got justice baked right in. Even with more and more states saying yes to legal cannabis, hundreds of thousands of people are still being arrested every year, most of them for possession—and they are disproportionately Black. It doesn’t have to be that way. With your help we can legalize cannabis while expunging prior cannabis convictions, and make 4/20 a day we all can celebrate.

5.title: What Is Juneteenth?
5.subtitle: Juneteenth (short for “June Nineteenth”) marks the day when federal troops arrived in Galveston, Texas in 1865 to take control of the state and ensure that all enslaved people be freed. The troops’ arrival came a full two and a half years after the signing of the Emancipation Proclamation. Juneteenth honors the end to slavery in the United States and is considered the longest-running African American holiday.

6.title: Grace X Originals LLC
6.subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

6.title: Kultured Misfits
6.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck

7.title: How to Be an Antiracist
7.subtitle: Ibram X. Kendi's concept of antiracism reenergizes and reshapes the conversation about racial justice in America—but even more fundamentally, points us toward liberating new ways of thinking about ourselves and each other.

7.title: Plum Good
7.subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce

8.title: How we're priming some kids for college — and others for prison
8.subtitle: In the United States, two institutions guide teenagers on the journey to adulthood: college and prison. Sociologist Alice Goffman spent six years in a troubled Philadelphia neighborhood and saw first-hand how teenagers of African-American and Latino backgrounds are funneled down the path to prison — sometimes starting with relatively minor infractions. In an impassioned talk she asks, "Why are we offering only handcuffs and jail time?"

8.title: The Honey Wine Company
8.subtitle: Inspired by his country's national beverage t'ej (honey wine), Ayele realized that these flowering trees were an ideal source of nectar and pollen that bees use to make valuable honey.  This set Ayele on a quest to better understand the art and business of creating honey wine.

products.name: Brut 750ml Honey Wine
products.description: The world standard for premium dry honey wine. Barrel aged in 100% French oak. Crisp, dry, and complex but with no bitter tannins.  Imbibers who enjoy drier cocktails or cider, pilsner style beers, and a variety of grape wine will appreciate versatile "Brut."

products.name: Demi Sec Sparkling 750ml Honey Wine
products.description: The world standard sweeter sparkling honey wine and the world’s first and only Charmat method honey wine (less yeasty and more ‘fruit forward’ than the Champagne method - most perfect for delicate honey wine - especially a sweeter honey wine).

products.name: Wancha (Grape Wine) 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon 750ml
products.description: Produced from certified organic grapes from North Ponderosa Vineyards in the Sierra Foothills, this 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon explodes with deep fruit flavors and aromas of plum, blackberry, and raisins. The silky smooth mouth feel ends with a dry, subtle, medium tannin finish. Aged for 14 Months in two year old French Oak Barrels (65%) and 35% New American Oak Barrels. Cellared and bottled in Sonoma County, 14% ABV.

9.title: Princess Omalie
9.subtitle: Welcome To The Wonderful World Of Princess Omalie Unlock the magic and lore of The kingdom of IgboOrai, Africa’s oldest Monarchy and greatest dynasty of kings and queens! We’ve been waiting for you!

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Gala Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Gala Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coiffed.

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Coronation Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Coronation Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coifed in a rich, soft cape and a smooth silky costume, designed by "Atelier de Babazongo" – dressmakers of the Royal family. As a treat, she holds a special key as your invitation to unlock the magic of her kingdom.

products.name: Princess Omalie, The Coronation And The Polka Dot Lamb
products.description: Princess Omalie of the African kingdom of IgboOrai could be the happiest girl on the planet — except that her family has been under a curse. Unless the curse of the Goliath beetle necklace is lifted, Omalie’s father might die in a horrible freak accident. He might never be crowned king. Omalie worries about her family, and about her own safety; how will she ever lead a peaceful happy life, have friends, and go to school?

9.title: First police report in Tyre Nichols case does not match video
9.subtitle: An initial police report filed in the hours after the Tyre Nichols traffic stop suggested he was violent and made claims that were contradicted by video later released by police.

10.title: How colorism shapes our standards of beauty
10.subtitle: When Chika Okoro read the casting call for one of her favorite films, she noticed that actresses with darker skin were assigned lesser roles — prompting her to address a phenomenon she'd experienced all her life: colorism. In this eye-opening talk, Okoro shares coping strategies along with steps that could help eliminate this insidious and destructive mindset of discrimination.

10.title: Derek Chauvin Is Sentenced To 22 1/2 Years For George Floyd's Murder
10.subtitle: A Minnesota judge sentenced Derek Chauvin to 22 1/2 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd — a punishment that exceeds the state's minimum guidelines but falls short of prosecutors' request of a 30-year sentence.

11.title: Very Puzzled
11.subtitle: As a parent it can be quite challenging to find items such as books and toys that are representative of the diverse society that we live in.  It is important that children see other people that look different to themselves in the books and toys that they interact with to ensure that they appreciate their own heritage and respect the heritage and culture of others.

12.title: Juneteenth is a federal holiday. What comes next?
12.subtitle: As President Biden signed the Juneteenth National Independence Day Act into law, he acknowledged a current struggle for voting rights.

13.title: Big Mama's Sauce

This homemade recipe has been the highlight of our family gatherings since at least 2002…honestly Big Mama can’t even remember, that’s how long she been making it! Big Mama never liked store bought sauce and she wanted to serve only the best to her loved ones. So here we are…on the store shelf ironically! Lol…We hope you taste only love and enjoy just as our family has for all of these years!

14.title: What If I Don't Move to the Back of the Bus?
14.subtitle: Rosa Parks brought together a unique blend of life experiences, a commitment to racial justice, and a flawless reputation to transform a single act of defiance into a defining moment for the modern American civil rights movement.

15.title: Support our Young Protest Leaders #freetianna

15.title: TGEU International Women’s Day - Inclusivity Media Statement

16.title: The symbols of systemic racism — and how to take away their power
16.subtitle: Multidisciplinary artist and TED Fellow Paul Rucker is unstitching the legacy of systemic racism in the United States. A collector of artifacts connected to the history of slavery — from branding irons and shackles to postcards depicting lynchings — Rucker couldn't find an undamaged Ku Klux Klan robe for his collection, so he began making his own.

17.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
17.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

18.title: The RACE Method Of Talking To A Racism Skeptic
18.subtitle: The RACE Method is an approach that anti-racism allies can take to trying to share their perspective with people who are skeptical that racism against people of color is a problem worthy of specific attention. It is based on principles from non-violent communication and on findings from the science of persuasion.

18.title: Bessie Smith, The Empress of the Blues
18.subtitle: She was big and brown and built high off the ground — "a hell of a woman," men called her, but most women said she was "rough." And while there were other blues singers in the first half of the 20th century — some who shared her surname — none could be mistaken for Bessie Smith.

19.title: It’s Nola

19.title: The police who killed Tyre Nichols were Black. But they might still have been driven by racism

20.title: Liberation Library

We believe it is now more important than ever for incarcerated young people to have access to other worlds of their choosing.

22.title: Swimming caps designed for natural hair banned from Tokyo Olympic Games
22.subtitle: Swimming caps designed for natural Black hair — and created by a Black-owned company — will not be allowed at the upcoming Olympic Games in Tokyo. The International Swimming Federation said the caps do not follow "the natural form of the head," British brand Soul Cap told BBC News.

22.title: How the Negro National League Was Formed | Field of Dreams...Deferred
22.subtitle: The Negro National League debuted 100 years ago with world-class players and legions of fans. Hear how founder Rube Foster formed the league in Part 1 of "Field of Dreams...Deferred," a four-part series from TBS.

23.title: How studying privilege systems can strengthen compassion
23.subtitle: Her TED Talk offers a shift in the traditional view of race, equity and privilege. McIntosh uses her own experience as a white woman to inform her own knowledge of racial experiences from a white perspective.

23.title: Microaggressions Matter
23.subtitle: They may not always be ill-intentioned, but the slights illuminate deeper problems in America.

25.title: Four-year Analysis: Police-related deaths across racial groups
25.subtitle: A four-year research study released on June 24th, 2020 shows that Black Americans were, on average, more than three times as likely as White Americans to be killed during a police encounter.

26.title: How to deconstruct racism, one headline at a time

In this profound, thought-provoking and often hilarious talk, he reveals the power of language to change stories of trauma into stories of healing — while challenging us all to level up.

We always have parents in mind in the design process and are proud to present products that are functional, toxin-free, sourced from high-quality materials, and aesthetically pleasing.

products.name: Kids Hair Care Kits
products.description: Try our kid-friendly haircare kits curated for your Darlyng to grow and maintain healthy hair.

products.name: Muslin Newborn Swaddle Blanket
products.description: These soft cuddly blankets can be used in a variety of ways like a car seat cover, nursing, playtime, tummy time, stroller rides, receiving blanket and more.

products.name: Teether Plush Sensory Toy- Glow in the dark
products.description: Yummy Buddy is designed to engage vision, auditory and fine motor skills from infant to toddler and beyond. Bright, contrasting patterns will fascinate baby as eyesight develops, and they can discover new sounds, colors, and textures before. There’s a multi-purpose clip designed for strollers or diaper bags so it can travel with you. Exploring role play fun at home and on the go. Yummy Buddy has crinkly ears, both chewable "glow" silicone hands, teething bib, multiple colors, and chimes when shaken, too! The perfect sensory chew toy.

30.title: Legends profile: Michael Jordan
30.subtitle: By acclamation, Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player of all time. Although, a summary of his basketball career and influence on the game inevitably fails to do it justice, as a phenomenal athlete with a unique combination of fundamental soundness, grace, speed, power, artistry, improvisational ability and an unquenchable competitive desire, Jordan single-handedly redefined the NBA superstar.

31.title: VZN Clothing
31.subtitle: Our clothing is made to motivate you to visualize your goals and remain persistent through adversity. Vision is not simply seeing with the eyes, but rather creating a positive image and experience for your future success with your mind. By following your vision with action and remaining persistent through adversity, we believe anything is possible.

products.name: Spread Love, Not Germs Heart Mask
products.description: Black mask with red and white embroidery

products.name: Tre Balloon Series 1.0 Tee
products.description: For the Tre Series, we follow the boy, Tre, on his path of following his dreams. The purpose of Tre being lifted by the balloons while holding the basketball is to inspire people to work towards their goals with the confidence of a child who is following their dreams.

products.name: Memory Lane Poster Print
products.description: 8 x 11 in 80 lb paper Oil painting print with a matte finish

31.title: Alaffia
31.subtitle:
Alaffia is an online Fair Trading company that specializes in soaps and beauty products. We aim to alleviate poverty and advance gender equality through the Fair Trade of indegenious resources and community empowerment projects.

Together, we’re cultivating beauty, equality and empowerment in West Africa and around the globe. Our women’s cooperatives in West Africa handcraft indigenous raw ingredients then the Alaffia team in Olympia, Washington creates the finished products. Alaffia returns the proceeds from the sale of these products to our communities to fund community empowerment and gender equality projects.
